今

Значения

Теперь, сейчас

Мнемоника

  • "Что ты сейчас делаешь?"
    "Я пою la-la-la (ラララ) у себя дома."

heisig_chinese_memo: My MEETING is at seven but that's NOW!
heisig_story: The final stroke of this kanji is a rare shape, which we have not met before and will only meet in this character and others that include it as a primitive. We are more accustomed to seeing it straightened out as part of other shapes - for instance, as the second stroke of mouth. If you need any help at all with this character, you may picture it as two hands of a clock pointing to what time it is now. The element above it, meeting, should easily relate to that image.

origin_of_ch_char_book: (今, jin, present) There is a lid covering the top of the product and food below. The reason why people cover the lid is to eat it immediately before it cools. So now it means ‘ now ‘. (合, he, close; combine) The character shows the lid \of the container, depicting the food together in a bowl and covered it with a lid. It is used as the meaning of ‘close’ or ‘gathering’. ‘,(金, jin, gold; metal) has a lid covering the top of the object and something under it (今, jin, now), and a soil beneath it (土, tu, soil), and some points dotted around them . As a whole, this character means gathering the shiny particles that are contained in the soil. It originally meant various metals contained in the soil, but later it came to mean gold.
humanum_full_description_en:
The oracle bone inscriptions of this character are composed of 亼 and one, or save one and only start from "亼". There are different opinions on the interpretation of this character. Among them, one thinks that "亼" is like an upside-down mouth (see Lin Yiguang, Guan Ziyin, etc.), and " one " may be the provincial language of the tongue, so " Jin " is like stretching the tongue down with one mouth; " drink " in the oracle bone inscriptions , "食", and the shape and structure of the words " Ming " and "令" can be used as side evidence for this theory (see " Drink ", "食"). In addition, from "亼" from "一" to the present, also The first article can be regarded as " Yin ", which means bowing down and groaning, and bitterly chanting. In addition, Xu Zhongshu thinks that " now " is like a wooden duo, "亼" is like a bell, and " one " is like a wooden tongue. Xu pointed out that in the Shang and Zhou dynasties, Muduo used to issue orders. " Today " is the moment when the order is issued. The above two theories basically give two completely different interpretations of the configuration of "亼" and "今", namely, "speaking down" and "muduo" respectively. Among them, we believe that the former can basically provide reasonable explanations for some Chinese characters that express specific things, such as " drink " and "食", and for some more abstract words such as "命" and "令" (to issue orders). ; After that, it cannot fully explain the above Chinese characters, but can only explain the far abstract "今" character individually. Balancing various factors, we think the first argument (ie speaking or eating with the tongue down) is more reasonable. Under this understanding, the original meanings of "亼" and "今" are similar to those of the words " yue " and "言". In this way, Xu Zhongshu "Muduo" said that even if there is some truth in part, it is no longer necessary. According to the principle of Occam's Razor, it can be eliminated.

From this perspective, " this " may be humble, "groan" or "recite" a " Yin original character", as to the abstract meaning of " now " just under the guise of results. "Shuowen": The motto "Today, is the time also" basically only reflects the meaning of the word "今" under the guise of the future, and has nothing to do with the original shape of the current character.

In addition, Qiu Xigui think the ancient text " Today " is written down, " said " the word, " said, " Talking like shape. In fact, Qiu said that "亼" should be interpreted as "reverse," but he said that " Jin " seems to be silent. It is the first essay of " Yin ", but it should be pretended to be "噤", which means silence. "Historical Records. Biography of the Marquis of Huaiyin: "Although there is the wisdom of Shun and Yu, chanting is not as good as the deaf finger." The same usage can also be found in "Lu Shi Chun Qiu", "Suo Yuan", "Huang Di Nei Jing Su Wen" Wait. Gu Bei said. See " yue ", " yan " and other words.

As for the word "今" under the guise of the tense meaning "今", its usage has also been published very early. "今" in the oracle bone inscriptions already means today, "Collection" 20912: "It rains today."

Jin Wen said that today, the county concubine Gui: "From today, grandchildren and sons and mothers (wu) □ hope (forget) Bai (bo) to rest." He also said that today, at this time, the training: "Today I am pardon my daughter (you) )", which means I forgive you now.

humanum_full_description:
今字的甲骨文構形由亼及一組成，或省一而只從「亼」。今字的釋形，各家意見分殊。其中，一說以為「亼」象倒置之口（參林義光、關子尹等），而「一」可能是舌的省文，故「今」象一口朝下伸舌；甲骨文中的「飲」、「食」，和「命」、「令」等字的形構可作為此說之側證（參見「飲」、「食」），此外，從「亼」從「一」的今，也可視為「吟」的初文，有俯首呻吟、苦吟之意。另外，徐中舒則以為「今」象木鐸之形，「亼」象鈴體，「一」象木舌。徐氏指出商周時代，以木鐸發號施令，「今」即發令當下的時刻，引申而有即刻、現在的意思。上面二說基本上對「亼」、「今」的構形作出了兩種迥然不同的解釋，即分別指「口舌向下」與「木鐸」。此中，我們認為前說基本上對一些表達具體的事象的漢字，如「飲」、「食」，和對一些較抽象的字如「命」、「令」(發號施令)都能提供合理解釋；而後說則不能全解釋上述漢字，而只能個別地解釋遠為抽象的「今」字。平衡各種因素，我們認為第一說（即口舌朝下說話或飲食）較為合理。按此理解下的「亼」、「今」的本義，其形構與「曰」、「言」等字相類似。如是一來，徐中舒「木鐸」一說，即使局部地有一些道理，但已顯不出其必要性，根據奧坎剃刀 (Occam's Razor) 原則，乃可予剔除。

　　由是觀之，「今」可能是俯首「呻吟」或「吟詠」的「吟」的原字，至於抽象意味的「今」只是假借的結果。《說文》：「今，是時也」一訓，基本上只反映「今」字假借以後的意義，而與今的原初字形無關。

　　此外，裘錫圭認為古文字「今」是倒寫的「曰」字，「曰」象說話之形。裘說其實也暗示了「亼」應解作「倒口」，只不過他說「今」象閉口不言，是「吟」的初文，但應通假作「噤」，表示閉口不作聲。《史記．淮陰侯列傳》：「雖有舜、禹之智，吟而不言，不如瘖聾之指麾也。」相同的用法還見於《呂氏春秋》、《說苑》、《黃帝內經素問》等。姑備一說。參見「曰」、「言」等字。

　　至於「今」字假借為時態意義的「今」，其用法亦甚早出，甲骨文中「今」已表示今日，《合集》20912：「今夕其雨」。

　　金文表示今日，縣妃簋：「其自今日，孫孫子子母(毋)□朢(忘)白(伯)休。」又表示現今、此時，訓匜：「今我赦女(汝)」，意思是說現在我赦免你。
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「亼」(倒口)從「一」，是「吟」的初文。本義有兩說，一說表示閉口不言，一說表示呻吟。

今字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jīn］
［《廣韻》居吟切，平侵，見。］
(1)现在。
(2)指今日，即当天。
(3)现代；当代。与“古”相对。
(4)即，将。
(5)指示代词。这，此。
(6)句首语气助词。犹言夫。
(7)假设连词。犹言若。多用于由一件事联系推说到当前的另一件事。《礼记·曾子问》：“下殤土周葬于園，遂輿機而往，塗邇故也。今墓遠，則其葬也如之何？”王引之《经传释词》卷五：“今墓遠，若墓遠也。”《孟子·梁惠王下》：“此無他，與民同樂也；今王與百姓同樂，則王矣。”汉王充《论衡·感虚》：“湯之致旱以過乎？是不與天地同德也；今不以過致旱乎，自責禱謝，亦無益也。”一说，仍为本义。参阅杨树达《词诠》卷四。
(8)通“金”。
